verses.name: Mark 5:5
verses.text: And always, night and day, he was in the mountains, and in the tombs, crying, and cutting himself with stones.

verses.name: Mark 5:6
verses.text: But when he saw Jesus afar off, he ran and worshipped him,

verses.name: Mark 5:7
verses.text: And cried with a loud voice, and said, What have I to do with thee, Jesus, thou Son of the most high God? I adjure thee by God, that thou torment me not.

verses.name: Mark 5:8
verses.text: For he said unto him, Come out of the man, thou unclean spirit.

verses.name: Mark 5:9
verses.text: And he asked him, What is thy name? And he answered, saying, My name is Legion: for we are many.
